plot: Lex attempts to take control of half the population of Earth, as the first step in his plan to "fix" the universe.

Team Supergirl splits up to stop Lex's plan to make half the population adore him, and kill the other half. Lena has to discover if Supergirl will trust her after Lena joined forces with her stepbrother. Brainiac-5 apologizes to Dreamer for turning against her and the others, and J'onn fears that the mental binding ritual necessary to stop Lex's satellites may reveal his subconscious thoughts and disrupt the process.—The CW
